text: Fikret Alomerović (; born 3 December 1970 in Skopje) is a former Macedonian football player. ==Club career== Born in Skopje, SR Macedonia, back then still within Yugoslavia, Alomerović played with FK Skopje, FK Radnički Niš, FK Vardar, FK Sloga Jugomagnat, FC Torpedo-Luzhniki Moscow, HIT Gorica, Valur and Víkingur.Profile by footballfacts.ru ==External links== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Skopje Category:Association football defenders Category:Macedonian footballers Category:FK Skopje players Category:FK Radnički Niš players Category:FK Vardar players Category:FK Sloga Jugomagnat players Category:FC Torpedo Moscow players Category:ND Gorica players Category:Valur players Category:Knattspyrnufélagið Víkingur players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Slovenian PrvaLiga players Category:Úrvalsdeild karla (football) players Category:Macedonian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Serbia and Montenegro Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Serbia and Montenegro Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovenia Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Slovenia Category:Expatriate footballers in Iceland Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Iceland
title: Fikret Alomerović
